ing: 1/4 cup sour cream, or to taste
2 1/2 teaspoons balsamic vinaigrette dressing (such as Wish-BoneÂ®)
4 pinches garlic salt with parsley (such as Lawry'sÂ®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is kid-approved and great to serve chilled on a hot summer's day. Great addition to any meal or just alone."
ins: Combine tomatoes and cucumbers in a bowl. Add sour cream, balsamic vinaigrette, lemon juice, dill, and garlic salt; stir. Season with salt and ground pepper.
